title: Arbitration clause in new StackExchange ToS

tosdr.tldr:
"YOU ARE GIVING UP YOUR RIGHT TO PARTICIPATE AS A CLASS REPRESENTATIVE OR CLASS MEMBER ON ANY CLASS CLAIM YOU MAY HAVE AGAINST US INCLUDING ANY RIGHT TO CLASS ARBITRATION OR ANY CONSOLIDATION OF INDIVIDUAL ARBITRATIONS." Stackexchange ToS (https://stackexchange.com/legal/terms-of-service/public#licensing)

https://meta.stackexchange.com/questions/309746/a-new-2018-update-to-our-terms-of-service-is-here
https://meta.stackexchange.com/questions/309797/were-examining-the-implementation-of-arbitration-in-the-2018-tos-update
